text: The 2021 UEFA Super Cup will be the 46th season of the UEFA Super Cup. It will be played between the winners of the 2020–21 UEFA Champions League, and the 2020–21 UEFA Europa League winners. It will be played at Windsor Park in Belfast, Northern Ireland. ==Match== ===Details=== The Champions League winners will be designated as the "home" team for administrative purposes. Match rules *90 minutes. *30 minutes of extra time if necessary. *Penalty shoot-out if scores still level. *Twelve named substitutes. *Maximum of three substitutions, with a fourth allowed in extra time. ==Related pages== *2021 UEFA Champions League Final *2021 UEFA Europa League Final *2021 UEFA Women's Champions League Final ==References== ==Other websites== * 2021 Category:2021 in association football Category:2021 in Europe Category:Football in Northern Ireland Category:History of Belfast Category:2021 in the United Kingdom
title: 2021 UEFA Super Cup
